summary: I always thought that the Main menu was kinda boring at the beggining, so I decided to make this simple mod to skip to the epicness right away.
descriptionHtml: I always thought that the Main menu music was kinda slow at the beggining, and you had to wait 2 minutes for the epicness to start, so I decided to make this simple mod to skip to the epicness right away. I made this small mod for myself, but it turned out good enough according to me to be uploaded and shared with whoever is seeking for a more epic Skyrim intro music theme....so here it is, enjoy! :)
author: AntarVerfarkas
